scripts.setup: wget https://golang.org/dl/go1.8.1.linux-amd64.tar.gz && tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.8.1.linux-amd64.tar.gz && echo 'export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'export GOPATH=$HOME/go' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'export GOBIN=$GOPATH/bin' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'export GOROOT=/usr/local/go' >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc
